mapper.select: SELECT appr_no , appr_title , appr_content , create_date , expire_date , appr_status , department_name , approval.user_no , appr_type , user_name , form_name , form_path FROM approval JOIN appr_form ON approval.appr_type=appr_form.appr_type JOIN employee ON approval.user_no=employee.user_no LEFT JOIN department ON approval.dept_no=department.department_id WHERE appr_no=#{apprNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE approval a SET a.appr_status = ( CASE WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM appr_elmnt e WHERE e.appr_no = #{apprNo} AND e.appr_result != 'a2') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM appr_elmnt e WHERE e.appr_no = #{apprNo}) THEN 'a2' -- 모든 결재자가 승인한 경우 WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM appr_elmnt e WHERE e.appr_no = #{apprNo} AND e.appr_result = 'a3') THEN 'a3' -- 한 명이라도 반려한 경우 ELSE 'a1' -- 그 외의 경우 (예상치 못한 경우) END ) WHERE a.appr_no = #{apprNo}
UPDATE approval SET appr_date = SYSDATE WHERE appr_no = #{apprNo} AND appr_status IN ('a2', 'a3', 'a4')
